speaker: President.
english:
President. The next item is the report by James Elles, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the 2007 budget: the Commission's Annual Policy Strategy report (APS) [ 2006/2020(BUD) ] ( A6-0154/2006 ).
First on my list of speakers is Mrs Grybauskaitė, on behalf of the Commission, but, as I understand it, she would prefer the rapporteur to begin. Are you prepared to begin, Mr Elles?
original:
President. The next item is the report by James Elles, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the 2007 budget: the Commission's Annual Policy Strategy report (APS) [ 2006/2020(BUD) ] ( A6-0154/2006 ).
First on my list of speakers is Mrs Grybauskaitė, on behalf of the Commission, but, as I understand it, she would prefer the rapporteur to begin. Are you prepared to begin, Mr Elles?
